O

objectAdded(ObjectSceneEvent, Object) - Method in interface org.netbeans.api.visual.model.ObjectSceneListener
Called to notify that an object was added to an object scene.
objectRemoved(ObjectSceneEvent, Object) - Method in interface org.netbeans.api.visual.model.ObjectSceneListener
Called to notify that an object was removed from an object scene.
ObjectScene - Class in org.netbeans.api.visual.model
This class manages mapping between model-objects and widgets on a scene.
ObjectScene() - Constructor for class org.netbeans.api.visual.model.ObjectScene
 
ObjectSceneEvent - Class in org.netbeans.api.visual.model
A wrapper object for the ObjectScene when it is passed to ObjectSceneListener.
ObjectSceneEventType - Enum in org.netbeans.api.visual.model
This enum is used for specifying events in which an object scene listener is interested.
ObjectSceneListener - Interface in org.netbeans.api.visual.model
This interface represents a listener that is notified about changes in a object scene which is passed as the first parameter of every listener methods.
ObjectState - Class in org.netbeans.api.visual.model
This class holds a state of a object or a widget.
objectStateChanged(ObjectSceneEvent, Object, ObjectState, ObjectState) - Method in interface org.netbeans.api.visual.model.ObjectSceneListener
Called to notify that the object state of an object is changed.
openEditor(Widget) - Method in interface org.netbeans.api.visual.action.InplaceEditorProvider.EditorController
Opens an in-place editor on a specified widget.
org.netbeans.api.visual.action - package org.netbeans.api.visual.action
This package contains ActionFactory class which is factory of all built-in widget-actions provided by the library.
org.netbeans.api.visual.anchor - package org.netbeans.api.visual.anchor
This package contains Anchor interface which is used by ConnectionWidget for defining its source and target point.
org.netbeans.api.visual.animator - package org.netbeans.api.visual.animator
This package contains SceneAnimator classes which is used for controlling animations on a scene.
org.netbeans.api.visual.border - package org.netbeans.api.visual.border
This package contains Border interface which is used for supplying a border graphics for a widget.
org.netbeans.api.visual.export - package org.netbeans.api.visual.export
This package contains the class necessary to export a Scene to an image file and get the coordinates from the exported image to create an HTML image map
org.netbeans.api.visual.graph - package org.netbeans.api.visual.graph
This package contains built-in graph-oriented models.
org.netbeans.api.visual.graph.layout - package org.netbeans.api.visual.graph.layout
This package contains built-in graph-oriented layout algorithms.
org.netbeans.api.visual.laf - package org.netbeans.api.visual.laf
This package contains LookFeel class with style definition for colors and borders.
org.netbeans.api.visual.layout - package org.netbeans.api.visual.layout
This package contains Layout interface which defines a widget-layout.
org.netbeans.api.visual.model - package org.netbeans.api.visual.model
This package contains ObjectScene class which is a scene with ability to register model-objects with widgets on the scene.
org.netbeans.api.visual.print - package org.netbeans.api.visual.print
This package contains a single class ScenePrinter used to print a Scene according to various constraints.
org.netbeans.api.visual.router - package org.netbeans.api.visual.router
This package contains Router interface which defines a router for ConnectionWidget.
org.netbeans.api.visual.vmd - package org.netbeans.api.visual.vmd
This package contains a VMD visualization style.
org.netbeans.api.visual.widget - package org.netbeans.api.visual.widget
This package contains Widget class.
org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.general - package org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.general
This package contains general high-level widgets.
